title: Our Team
subtitle: Mentors and innovators collaborating to grow startups and future leaders.
description: At NovaNest, we believe that success is not just the result of great ideas — it’s the outcome of a shared synergy among people who move forward with energy, experience, and faith in the future. Our team is a dynamic blend of mentors, core members, and trainees who collaborate, learn continuously, and support startups on their journey toward growth and success. We believe that when the knowledge, experience, and connections of mentors merge with the energy, creativity, and innovation of the new generation, the best results are achieved. This is where our motto comes to life: Synergy of Energy — the fusion of energies to create a better future.

Our vision at NovaNest is clear: to empower young entrepreneurs and create a platform for growth, innovation, and meaningful impact. We value collaboration, learning, and diversity, and believe that every idea, every voice, and every experience within our team is an opportunity to grow, learn, and create value together.

people.name: Rasoul Moradimehr
about: Dr. Moradimehr is an experienced entrepreneur and investor with more than a decade of expertise in business development, investment, and startup leadership. He began his professional journey in Iran, where he founded and managed several successful ventures that provided him with valuable knowledge in entrepreneurship and innovation. Among his most notable initiatives are the founding and management of Landa Investment Holding, the creation of the Landa Business Academy to empower young talents, and the establishment and leadership of the Forough Knowledge-Based Accelerator.

In addition, Rasoul served as Chairman of the Board of Farazman, where he played a key role in building strong connections between academia and industry, and forged partnerships with international universities and educational institutions. He was also the pioneer of the “Education Through Travel” model in Iran, an innovative approach that combined learning with real-world experiences and exploration.
Throughout his career, Rasoul Moradimehr has collaborated with numerous successful international startups, gaining invaluable experience in scaling ventures globally.
After moving to Canada, he launched Novanest Venture, a firm dedicated to supporting startups and international entrepreneurs through investment, acceleration, and advisory services.
Under his leadership, Novanest Venture focuses on:
• Investing in and accelerating early-stage and growth-stage startups
• Delivering specialized services within the Canada Start-up Visa Program
• Advising and supporting international entrepreneurs entering the Canadian market
• Designing and implementing provincial entrepreneurship programs
• Establishing the Novanest Business Academy to inspire and empower teenagers in entrepreneurship

Rasoul Moradi Mehr strongly believes that combining his past experiences with new opportunities in Canada can create a powerful platform for innovation, economic growth, and building a brighter future for the next generation of entrepreneurs.

people.name: Rasoul Moradimehr
about: With a PhD in hand and a heart set on innovation, I’ve spent the past decade building bridges between ideas and execution. My journey began in the vibrant startup ecosystems of Canada, where I discovered my passion for mentoring emerging entrepreneurs and guiding them through the maze of business development. As the Chief of the Board at NovaNest Venture, I’ve had the privilege of working alongside visionary founders, helping them shape scalable ventures through strategic planning and venture capital insights. My professional path is rooted in collaboration, and I thrive in environments where teamwork fuels transformation.

Beyond boardrooms and pitch decks, I’m deeply invested in the human side of entrepreneurship. I believe that great businesses are built not just on brilliant ideas, but on resilient people. Whether I’m hosting mentorship sessions, exploring new investment opportunities, or brainstorming with startup teams, I bring a mix of curiosity, empathy, and strategic thinking to the table. Based in Vancouver, I find inspiration in the city’s dynamic energy and multicultural spirit. My interests—mentoring, entrepreneurship, investment, and teamwork—aren’t just buzzwords; they’re the pillars of my daily life and the compass that guides my career.
